Sorry you're frustrated with this tutorial. I'd recommend that you try another tutorial: http://www.asp.net/mvc/tutorials

This discussion forum is for constructive discussion around the tutorial and getting help with ASP.NET MVC. It's not an appropriate place for personal attacks, profanity, or just letting people know that you're frustrated. I'm going to delete your comments which are not constructive, and will work with the CodePlex team to have your account removed as spam if this continues.
